postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y php8.3-mysqli && curl -L https://bin.equinox.io/c/bNyj1mQVY4c/ngrok-v3-stable-linux-amd64.tgz | tar xvz && sudo mv ngrok /usr/local/bin/
postStartCommand: sudo service mariadb start && sudo service apache2 start && ngrok config add-authtoken $NGROK_AUTHTOKEN && ngrok http 80 --domain=polliwog-fast-vaguely.ngrok-free.app > ~/ngrok.log 2>&1 &
